Info.Name: Form Control - Checkbox
Info.Description: Displays key value pairs as a set of checkboxes

GenericProperty.Name: Display As Switch
GenericProperty.Description: use bootstrap "form-swich" class

GenericProperty.Name: Pattern
GenericProperty.Description: Regex pattern to validatate the field

GenericProperty.Name: Placeholder
GenericProperty.Description: Placeholder text

GenericProperty.Name: HelpText
GenericProperty.Description: Text to display beneath the form control

Info.Name: Form Control - KeyPairs
Info.Description: Key value pairs for lists, checkboxes and radio buttons.

GenericProperty.Name: Layout
GenericProperty.Description: Display vertical or horizontal when grouped.

Info.Name: Form Control - Limits
Info.Description: Max and minimum values for certain controls

GenericProperty.Name: Min
GenericProperty.Description: Specifies a minimum value for a number or minimum number of characters

GenericProperty.Name: Max
GenericProperty.Description: Specifies the maximum value for a number or the maximum number of characters allowed

Info.Name: Form Control - List
Info.Description: Displays key value pairs as a dropdown or list control

GenericProperty.Name: Items
GenericProperty.Description: Values for the Dropdown

GenericProperty.Name: Multi Select
GenericProperty.Description: Enabling multiselect will render items as a list

Info.Name: Form Control - Radio Button
Info.Description: Displays key value pairs as a set of radio buttons

GenericProperty.Name: Rows
GenericProperty.Description: No. of rows in the textarea

GenericProperty.Name: Type
GenericProperty.Description: Select an input type, text, numeric, email etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Rows
GenericProperty.Description: No. of rows in the textarea

GenericProperty.Name: Accept
GenericProperty.Description:
takes a comma-separated list of allowed file extensions or MIME types. Some examples:
accept="image/**" — Accept any file with an image MIME type. accept="image/png, image/jpeg" or accept=".png,

GenericProperty.Name: Upload Path
GenericProperty.Description: Path to upload files

GenericProperty.Name: Name/Id
GenericProperty.Description: name of control, used for id and name attributes. For 'id' attribute spaces will be replaced replaced with '-'

GenericProperty.Name: Label
GenericProperty.Description: Label for the form control

GenericProperty.Name: Required
GenericProperty.Description: Control is mandatory

GenericProperty.Name: Error Message
GenericProperty.Description: Message to display if validation fails

GenericProperty.Name: Class
GenericProperty.Description: custom classes, they will be appended to the control class

GenericProperty.Name: Form Action
GenericProperty.Description: The full address of the surface controller method. i.e. /umbraco/surface/formssurface/SubmitTestForm

GenericProperty.Name: Form Display Legend
GenericProperty.Description: Display the title as the form <legend>

GenericProperty.Name: Item Key
GenericProperty.Description: Label of the value (displayed in form)

GenericProperty.Name: Item Value
GenericProperty.Description: The 'value' attribute of the item

DataType.Name: Form Control - Text Input Type - Dropdown
Form Settings - Form Display Legend - Toggle
Form Settings - Form Layout Columns - Numeric
Layout Settings Component - Background Color - Areas Background Colour - Color Picker
Layout Settings Component - Color Picker - layoutSettingsColourOpacity - Slider
Layout Settings Component - Color Picker - layoutSettingsColourShades - Slider
